books.title: THIRD EYE YOGA
books.description: What is the technique of vision without the aid of the eyes? With this phenomenon, the essence of the matter, as I said, is not in the irritation of the optic nerve. There is another point, the irritation of which is crucial for evoking perceptions of visions. books.title: Basic Computation and Programming with C
books.description: Providing in-depth coverage, this book covers the fundamentals of computation and programming in C language. Essential concepts including operators and expressions, input and output statements, loop statements, arrays, pointers, functions, strings and preprocessors are described in a lucid manner.
